reuters.title: LORIMAR <LT> GETS OUTBOARD MARINE <OMC> PACT
reuters.body: Lorimar/Telepictures Corp said its Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon and Eckhardt unit has been named the advertising agency for the Lawn Boy unit of Outboard Marine Corp <OMC>, replacing Walker and Associates. Annual billings are estimated at four mln dlrs, it said. Reuter 
